Articles.Content:
So i started having problems out of a sudden on a modded install.The game crashed when i wanted to load a saved craft or select a part.I decided to have a fresh install of ksp ,first uninstalling it from steam and then deleting the folder.After i tried this the game started to crash after reaching the main menu.I don't know where to look for log files ,the only one i could find was the KSP.log .

https://justpaste.it/47sbg 

This is from the buildID64.txt file

[config]
build id = 02694
2019.10.25 at 17:16:00 PDT
Branch: master
language = en-us
distribution name = Steam
See my sig for a link on where the log files are located

Heres player-prev.log and the player.log ,i think the output_log.txt might be outdated though.
https://www.dropbox.com/s/p95fuayi0bkwvqj/Player-prev.log?dl=0

https://www.dropbox.com/s/aq9aps8amhqtkpv/Player.log?dl=0

https://www.dropbox.com/s/jv5h4pqw8j0qxm1/output_log.txt?dl=0

Hope this helps.
So am i out of luck?A game ive been playing for years and now it just doesn't work :/
